lead_paragraph: A teenager, who pleaded not guilty to terrorism charges on Thursday, is accused of planning a holiday attack on the police in a Melbourne suburb.

headline.print_headline: Officials Say Youths Talked of Explosives on a Kangaroo
headline.main: Plotters Talked of Planting Explosives on a Kangaroo in Australia

snippet: A teenager, who pleaded not guilty to terrorism charges on Thursday, is accused of planning a holiday attack on the police in a Melbourne suburb.
abstract: Australian teen Sevdet Ramadan Besim, who discussed beheading police officer and using kangaroo painted with Islamic State symbol to deliver bombs, pleads not guilty to terrorism charges; plans were proposed in online conversation with British teen who pleaded guilty and was sentenced by British court in October 2015.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
